attributes.action: force all employers to participate in the Government Child Care Voucher scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently employers have to opt into the Government Child Care Voucher scheme, this petition is to take this decision away from the employer and force them to offer CCV to their employees.

Participation in the scheme offers savings to both the employer and employee.
A basic-rate taxpayer can save up to £962 per year, whilst a higher-rate taxpayer can save up to £1,196 per year.

Employers can offer their employees childcare vouchers worth up to £55 per week (£243 per month), free of tax and national insurance contributions.

The employer will also save national insurance contributions, currently at 12.8% of the value of the vouchers provided.
